summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD FOCUS. WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED, THE VEHICLE HESITATED AND VIBRATED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER (TRISTAR FORD IN BLAIRSVILLE, PA) WHERE AN UNKNOWN RECALL REPAIR WAS PERFORMED. THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL TIMES AFTER APPROXIMATELY THREE MONTHS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURES AND STATED THAT THERE WAS NO RECALL AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 49,000. UPDATED 11/02/17*LJ  *TR
